title: Is Taylor Swift the greatest musician ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: not by a long shot. she is a great musician, but there's thousands of years worth of singers that could have even larger ranges or better understanding of music or more mature lyrics. what matters is that she is a good musician now and hopefully will be remembered in 30 years

Ofc No one has found such success in such short span of time(13 years but her peak of success is really tall, which many artists have taken multiple decades to reach) No one has dared to change their genre so easily No has managed to maintain such a massive fanbase No one maintained to make people crave for narratives and hidden messages in their songs No one has had such an exquisite come back ( reputation) No one has had consistency in being an A-lister even with 3 ~kinda~ flop albums No one has had people crazy for them as much as they are for her even when half of the world has been criticizing her dating habits And most importantly no one has managed to stand the test of time like she has (go look at Katy Perry) So yeah she's basically the best till date
